Test Name: Hydroxyglutaric Acids, Glutaric Acid, Ethylmalonic Acid, and Methylsuccinic Acid, Serum
Purpose: Quantitative measurement of hydroxyglutaric acids, glutaric acid, ethylmalonic acid, and methylsuccinic acid in serum for diagnosing and monitoring metabolic disorders.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., serum separator tube)
